1.question: Robin has 3 packages of gum. There are 18 pieces in each package. How many pieces of gum does Robin have?

3.question: I have 54 cents to buy candy. If each piece of bulk candy costs 3 cents, how many gumdrops can I buy?

2.question: 21 people are going to the zoo. There are 3 vans to take people to the zoo. How many will go in each van if the same number go in each van and all of the people go to the zoo?

5.question: 19 children take a minibus to the zoo. They are to sit 2 or 3 to a seat. There are 7 seats. How many seats will have 3 children seated on them?

4.question: Maggi had 3 packages of cupcakes. There are 4 cupcakes in each package. She ate 5 cupcakes. How many are left?
